https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/feb7erNjGJ6dnfk9woBocaW58Nr.jpg 2013 Bollywood action drama by director V. Samudra starring the popular southern Indian actress Priyamani as Chandi, a skilled fighter. Together with her partner Azad, they work with local and national government, corruption and their own dark pasts. Chandi: The Power of Woman
